meta.title: From HURDLES to 800
meta.author: Sandy Weisz and Mao Reynolds
meta.message: I'm turning 49 this week. 49 is 7x7, so I'm celebrating with seven sets of seven: seven Raddles that go from the first to the seventh. A heptathlon is a combination of seven track and field events. The women’s Olympic heptathlon consists of 100-meter hurdles, a high jump, shot put, a 200-meter dash, a long jump, a javelin throw and a 800-meter run. Men compete in a ten-part Olympic decathlon, but women don’t. Athletes have been [campaigning](https://www.nytimes.com/2021/07/06/sports/olympics/us-track-field-decathlon-women-heptathlon.html) to change this.
